title: Business Analyst( Life Insurance)
description:
Greetings!!!

TCS is Hiring




Job Role- Senior Business Analyst ( Life Insurance )

Experience range- 8 to 12

Job Location- Kolkata




Must Have-




Good domain knowledge in Life Insurance in Business Analysis elicitation techniques
Good-to-Have Knowledge in end-to-end Life Insurance
To lead a team of Business Analyst working for Standard Life Change team
Analyze business, by documenting its systems and processes, assessing its business model, identifying vulnerabilities, and devising solutions.
Understand the customer need and translate them into detailed requirements to get the buy-in from all the required stakeholders.
Gather and analyse data to develop potential solutions including systems and process improvements for the organizational challenges.
Creation of requirement documents like, User stories, Business requirement document (BRD), System functional document (SFD), Calculation spec document, Correspondence Spec document etc.
Creation of Process flow diagrams, data and screen mapping documents etc.
Candidate should be conversant with and working knowledge in agile methodology.
Experience in implementing medium to large transformation projects will be an added advantage.




Inviting applications with updated Resume

Kindly ensure the highlighted keywords should be mentioned with specific experience in the resume.
